title: A drawing of Ahri's Q. Knees bent, I humbly ask for 50 RP.
body:
It would be great if a Rioter could gift me 50 RP for a chest and a key. 
I'm an Ahri main so I simply drew Ahri throwing out her Q. It kinda looks like me irl rn, reaching out for some RP.

replies.body: This is so cool!  I love the style and colors!  Some poros may have added some rp your way, I appreciate the effort put into this! :D
Thank you for the kind words, RP, and appreciating the effort. I appreciate your generosity. Thanks again.
